#summary How to install HT-History

= Windows =
 # Download the latest HT-History Windows installer package (.msi) from http://code.google.com/p/ht-history/downloads/list
 # Double click it in Windows explorer
 # Follow the instructions of the installer
 # If the installer complains about missing .NET 4.0 framework, install it from here: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851
 # Find a shortcut named 'HT-History' on your Desktop


= Linux / Mac = 
 # Install mono-complete
 # Download the latest HT-History binary archive (.tar.gz)
 # Extract it
 # Change to the extracted directory and call: mono HT-History.exe
